modName: Gauldur Amulet Boost and Orc Power
summary: Improves the Gauldur Amulet and adds a power for defense
descriptionHtml:
Improves the Gauldur Amulet alot so it fits better with the story of having to ahve a squad of their best mages take them out, also fixes the fragments too

changes the effects to this, incs the fragments aswell:

75pts of magika
75pts of health
34% Stronger destruction spells.

the new power is called Orc Savage Rage and is in a spell tome.
it\'s not seeded or placed anywhere in the game so you\'ll have to use the console.
+250pt health for 3 mins
60% fire,frost,shock and magic resist for 3 mins

reduced from 500pt and 80% resists for 5 mins

I made the orc power due to my vampire char having a -200% fire resist and died far too often to fire spells, not wanting to full on cheat I made that.

If you feel any of the items are over powered, let me know and i\'ll change them.
author: dm3rd
